Hi!

I am a Front-End Developer from The Netherlands with a background in communication, photography and design. I spend my workdays happily coding at YoungCapital. During my free time I like to learn more, tinker on projects and enjoy myself with friends, games and plants.

Technologies

Next to HTML and CSS, I started learning Ruby as my first programming language together with Ruby on Rails. My real learning experience started when I became a Front-End Developer and started working full-time in JavaScript and ReactJS. I now have two years of experience as a Front-End Developer and each day is a new day for learning.
